## FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy class

Set of rules controlling keyboard navigation from a flyout button.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FlyoutButtonNavigationPolicy implements INavigationPolicy<FlyoutButton> 
```
**Implements:** [INavigationPolicy](./blockly.inavigationpolicy.md)<!-- -->&lt;[FlyoutButton](./blockly.flyoutbutton.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getFirstChild(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.getfirstchild.md) |  | Returns null since flyout buttons have no children. |
|  [getNextSibling(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.getnextsibling.md) |  | Returns null since inter-item navigation is done by FlyoutNavigationPolicy. |
|  [getParent(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.getparent.md) |  | Returns the parent workspace of the given flyout button. |
|  [getPreviousSibling(\_current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.getprevioussibling.md) |  | Returns null since inter-item navigation is done by FlyoutNavigationPolicy. |
|  [isApplicable(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.isapplicable.md) |  | Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy. |
|  [isNavigable(current)](./blockly.flyoutbuttonnavigationpolicy.isnavigable.md) |  | Returns whether or not the given flyout button can be navigated to. |
